long_prompt: A shiny red violin with a curved neck rests in the hands of a young musician in a dimly lit concert hall, where the air is filled with the sweet scent of wood and the soft sound of the strings.
A single violin, crafted from dark wood with intricate carvings, rests on a wooden stand in the corner of a rustic music room, its strings awaiting the touch of a skilled musician.
A beautifully crafted wooden violin with a rich, glossy finish rests on a soft music stand in a cozy music room.
negative_long_prompt: Two shiny red violins with curved necks sit side by side on a dark wooden music stand in a small, cozy music room, where the walls are adorned with sheet music and the floor is covered with a soft, plush carpet.

Two violins, one with a glossy finish and the other with a weathered patina, lie side by side on a wooden music stand in a dimly lit room, their necks stretching towards each other as if in silent conversation.
Two violins, one with a dark brown finish and the other with a light natural wood finish, are placed on a wooden music stand in a warm and inviting music room.
